p.codeblock: virtual int sendCustomReportMessage(const char *id, const char* category, const char* event, const char* label, int value) = 0;
sendCustomReportMessage(id: string, category: string, event: string, label: string, value: number): number

section.p: Agora supports reporting and analyzing customized messages. This function is in the beta stage with a free trial. The ability provided in its beta test version is reporting a maximum of 10 message pieces within 6 seconds, with each message piece not exceeding 256 bytes and each string not exceeding 100 bytes. To try out this function, contact support@agora.io and discuss the format of customized messages with us.
